#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
bool chk[100050],flg=false;
long long ssrch(long long a[],long long n1,long long x)
{
    long long l=0,r=n1,mid;
    
    while(l<=r)
    {
        mid=l+(r-l)/2;
        if((a[mid]>x&&mid>0&&a[mid-1]<=x)||(a[mid]>x&&mid==0))
        break;
        if(a[mid]>x&&a[mid-1]>x)
        {
            r=mid-1;
            continue;
        }
        if(a[mid]<=x)
        {
            l=mid+1;
        }
    }
    return n1-mid;
}


long long merge(long long arr[],long long l,long long m,long long r,long long numl,long long numr)
{
    long long n1=m-l+1;
    long long n2=r-m;
    long long a[n1],i;
    for(i=0;i<n1;i++)
    {
        a[i]=arr[l+i];
    }
    sort(a,a+n1);
    long long z=0;
    for(i=0;i<n2;i++)
    {
        long long x=arr[m+1+i];
        
        long long y=ssrch(a,n1,x);
        z=z+y;
    }
    return z+numl+numr;
}


long long custom_sort(long long arr[], long long l,long long r)
{
    if(l<r)
    {
        long long m=l+(r-l)/2;
        long long numl=custom_sort(arr,l,m);
        long long numr=custom_sort(arr,m+1,r);
        long long num=merge(arr,l,m,r,numl,numr);
        return num;
    }
    else
    return 0;
}


long long calc(long long arr[],long long n)
{
    long long i,num;
    num=custom_sort(arr,0,n-1);
    return num;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,j=1;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<100050;i++)
	chk[i]=false;
	while(t--)
	{
	    long long n,k,i;
	    cin>>n>>k;
	    long long arr[n];
	    for(i=0;i,i<n;i++)
	    {
	        cin>>arr[i];
	    }
	    long long num=calc(arr,n);
	    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	    {
	        long long x=arr[i];
	        if(chk[x])
	        {flg=true;
	         break;
	        }
	        else
	        chk[x]=true;
	    }
	    //cout<<num<<" ";
	    if(k<=num)
	    cout<<"Case "<<j<<": "<<num-k<<"\n";
	    else
	    {
	        if(flg)
	        cout<<"Case "<<j<<": "<<"0"<<"\n";
	        else
	        {
	         
	         k=k-num;
	         if(k%2==0)
	         cout<<"Case "<<j<<": "<<"0"<<"\n";
	         else
	         cout<<"Case "<<j<<": "<<"1"<<"\n";
	        }
	    }
	    j++;
	}
	return 0;
}
